captions.text: Sup I’m Stas Davidov!
You were angry at us for not mentioning anything about the mad elections in Russia.
You know, i may be close to Moscow but politics really isn’t my thing.
That’s why i don’t talk about things i don’t understand.
So let’s talk about onanism [bananism!]
Well, not really about onanism [bananism!]
But about a hand and taekwondo.
[hand]
[taekwondo]
This right hand can beat you up only using it’s left! [with a pinky!]
I used to be a teakwondo master like you, then i took an arrow in the knee >--knee-->
[tables for hands]
Hmm, level of difficulty - Korean!
First they eat dogs [koreans, eh?]
then there’s that StarCraft thing
then K-pop
now this!
I don’t want to live on this planet anymore!
I heard that taekwondo means the way of a foot and a hand.
You know, the way of right hand isn’t child’s play either! [thorny]
Shit, now i won’t be able to play Hwoarang in Tekken anymore.
I’ve developed strange associations with teakwondo people [taekwondo associations]
Altho with the thumb sticking out it looks more like Goro with one hand missing.
We tried and we trierd till our fingers got tired [so long waffle]
BTW, it’s this hand master is a girl.
You know, if that makes any difference [who knows]
And by the looks of it the girl reeeally developed this hand of hers.
Well, hand can always help you, save you and will never leave you [except amputation]
What were *you* thinking about? [dirty perverts!]
This is no toilet humor [toilet -> humor]
Her hands in the vid are above toilet level [hands <- toilet]
The jokes are where the hands are.
[proof]
How can one use this hand with a face on it to do regular chores?
[you have a FACE on your hand!]
Like, cutting the dog [koreans, eh?]
Or clap
Or even, pardon, wipe your arse [pardon]
[hand is ashamed]
By the way, strangely almost noone mentioned masturbation in the comments [bananism]
There’s still hope, dear humanity.
And this is Horosho!
Second vid is sent by Supersladky Bubalekh.
And together with my friends
Mirlan Asakeyev
and Arstanbek Abdyldaev
very respected people in Kyrgyzstan [gyr-gyr %) ]
will tell you a couple of interesting things!
So [write it down]
Kyrgyz people are the oldest nation in the world.
Kyrgyz people are the are the oldest... are the oldest nation in the world.
Life on earth started with Kyrgyz.
Life on earth started with Kyrgyz.
Wait, that means that the first bacteria also was Kyrgyz?
There is proof to these words
But oh well...
Also .......... many more clever words [too bad it's not in Kyrgyz]
Kyrgyz are now carrying Adam's Y chromosomes in themselves, sucked in Kyrgyz DNA and altogether 63 and 50 %  ee radna alpha blood type...
Kyrgyz sucked in Kyrgyz DNA?
LOLWUT? O_O
Makes me imagine Kyrgyz Adam and Kyrgys Eve. [Adam-ata and Eve-apa]
There. Also we’re writing a letter to Medvedev. They’re already writing back. That means they agree [Abdyldaev logic]
disis now we
disis we not afraid
disis we write
Just like, for example, Vladimir Valamydych Putin [Vladimir Valamydych]
We write to Medveded, they're already sending the answer, like, they agree...
You prolly don’t know it yet but Kyrgyzstan is an energy core of the Earth.
Kyrgyzstan is an energy core of the Earth.
And the main thing
You’re gonna laugh but everything will be confirmed later, there'll be no wheantr
You’re gonna laugh but everything will be confirmed later, i can like tell you right now - there'll be no Wheantr.
There'll be no Wheantr
i can like tell you right now
There'll be no Wheantr
I can like tell you now .... there's gonna be a flood in the west.
fear!
You're gonna see it for yourselves and laugh.
Listen to the new Kyrhitler [Kyrhitler]
Or else!
Altho they lack passion.
It was one of Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin's answers.
People don’t like guys lacking in confidence.
Guys, just watch the whole thing, it’s worth it [for alternatively gifted - link's in the description]
There'll be no Wheantr
Anyways, it’s all fat lies, we all know winter is near!
And this is Horosho!
Last vid was sent by a guy with a name that really corresponds to what is happening - trashkorp.
You thought that the times of obscurantism and bullying the crippled are gone with the Middle Ages? [Stas actually thought that, can u imagine?]
Then watch this vid from Brasil!
And yes, it’s about the carnival.
But not the one you’re thinking about.
Here’s a cute chubby boy [at first sight] who will sing a song where the word “pew” appears 425 times.
And it’s not about a blaster fight.
Looks like it’s his family...
Well, HOW ELSE can you explain them having that much fun from this shit?
Coz “black sheep of the family” really is about them.
Freak panopticon, no doubt [Freak panopticon]
Yes-yes, let’s watch some more, other members of the family are gathering.
And this black midget is his identical twin.
If you didn’t get it, it’s a song about animals and the sounds they make.
You won’t believe but this gay in purple underpants is a deer [no, you're a deer!]
And he makes an “ai ai” sound.
[ AI AI ]
[see the similarity, no?]
There’re a lot of “animals” there.
[Hell is Brasil]
Including this woman [woman (port. moc,a)]
Oh you little chubby sexist!
Oh my Duck Tape! This vid just had a hot brasilian sex with my ears and eyes! [just like soap operas]
It’s Brasil, baby!
There’s only one same person here, with the “wtf am i doing here” face [wtfamidoinghere?]
And it’s that gay guy in purple underpants.
wtf am i doing here?
This guy is smth like a Big Bang in Brasil internet now [like Yaz]
And this song is smth like their “Wet Pussy” [ie Mega-blockbuster]
And it sticks to you just like it.... yello?
And this is Horosho!
And the question was sent to us by DJStas95
What things can you do best with your hands?
What things can you do best with your hands?
Well, what you do *best* we all know so try and be original.
Leave your interesting comments here on Youtube!
That’s all folks, I’m Stas Davidov. Subscribe, click “like” and send your videos here [thisishorosho.ru] to the “На Обзор” section.
So, who are your friends?
10 Gb of girlfriends!
My friends? /(. .)
Friends? You talking about those who laugh at you when you fall in a puddle?
my friends are pigs, creepers and sheep 5)
Facebook of vk.com?
[power surge in 3...2...1...]
ssssssssonovabitch!
[PS bitch isnt a curseword]

this is like really bad
�

title: This is Хорошо - Зима не будет ಠ_ಠ [There'll be no Wheantr]
